# `NWHLRink`

<div class="alert">
    <strong> Note </strong>
    <br>
    This class is created for historical reference and the NWHL is now defunct. As of 2021, the NWHL has changed its name to the Premier Hockey Federation. Please use the <span><a href="phf.html"><code style="color: #ffffff;">PHFRink</code></a></span> class going forward
</div>

> **Note**:
>
> This class is created for historical reference and the NWHL is now defunct. As of 2021, the NWHL has changed its name to the Premier Hockey Federation. Please use the [`PHFRink`](phf) class going forward

```{eval-rst}
.. autoclass:: sportypy.surfaces.hockey.NWHLRink
    :members:
```
